name: mygithubactions
description: This is to setup and test github actions to run Playwright tests

scripts.test:project1: playwright test --project='project-1-example' && mv allure-results/*.json allure-results/project-1/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:project2: playwright test --project='project-2-example-2' && mv allure-results/*.json allure-results/project-2/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:project3: playwright test --project='project-3-example-3' && mv allure-results/*.json allure-results/project-3/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:all-projects: npm run test:project1 && npm run test:project2 && npm run test:project3
scripts.test:all-with-report: npm run test:all-projects && npm run allure:consolidated
scripts.allure:project1: npx allure generate allure-results/project-1 --clean -o allure-report/project-1 && npx allure open allure-report/project-1
scripts.allure:project2: npx allure generate allure-results/project-2 --clean -o allure-report/project-2 && npx allure open allure-report/project-2
scripts.allure:project3: npx allure generate allure-results/project-3 --clean -o allure-report/project-3 && npx allure open allure-report/project-3
scripts.allure:consolidated: npx allure generate allure-results/project-1 allure-results/project-2 allure-results/project-3 --clean -o allure-report/consolidated && npx allure open allure-report/consolidated
